video.title: Riverdale
video.synopsis: While navigating the troubled waters of sex, romance, school and family, teen Archie and his gang become entangled in a dark Riverdale mystery.

episodes.synopsis: At Riverdale High, Betty, Archie, Jughead and new girl Veronica wrestle with clashing desires while coping with a fellow student's tragic death.
episodes.title: Chapter One: The River's Edge

episodes.synopsis: As police begin an investigation into Jason's death, Archie's guilt and Jughead's suspicions intensify. Betty struggles with her feelings for Archie.
episodes.title: Chapter Two: Touch of Evil

episodes.synopsis: After Archie and Cheryl open up to the sheriff, Betty asks Jughead to cover the case for the school paper. Veronica tangles with jock Chuck.
episodes.title: Chapter Three: Body Double

episodes.synopsis: Betty looks into Geraldine's past, while Jughead fights to save the drive-in. Veronica confronts her mom after Cheryl spots her arguing with a biker.
episodes.title: Chapter Four: The Last Picture Show

episodes.synopsis: As Jason's funeral nears, Betty digs deeper into his past, while Veronica comforts Cheryl. A new music opportunity complicates Archie's school plans.
episodes.title: Chapter Five: Heart of Darkness

episodes.synopsis: While Jughead and Betty zero in on Polly's whereabouts, Valerie helps Archie with a crisis of confidence and Veronica reels from a double betrayal.
episodes.title: Chapter Six: Faster, Pussycats! Kill! Kill!

episodes.synopsis: Amid harsh rumors about Polly, Alice goes public with family secrets, making Betty and Cheryl uneasy allies. Jughead helps his dad reclaim his life.
episodes.title: Chapter Seven: In a Lonely Place

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to bring the Cooper family together, Veronica hosts a baby shower for Polly. Archie steps in to help after his dad's construction crew quits.
episodes.title: Chapter Eight: The Outsiders

episodes.synopsis: Cheryl persuades Archie to escort her to a private Blossom family event. Veronica reaches out to Ethel and urges Hermione to come clean with Fred.
episodes.title: Chapter Nine: La Grande Illusion

episodes.synopsis: While Fred is away, Betty decides to throw Jughead a surprise birthday party at Archie's. Veronica uncovers alarming facts about her dad and Clifford.
episodes.title: Chapter Ten: The Lost Weekend

episodes.synopsis: As Betty and Archie prepare for homecoming, Jughead reconnects with his now-sober dad. But Veronica and Alice conspire to secretly investigate FP.
episodes.title: Chapter Eleven: To Riverdale and Back Again

episodes.synopsis: After FP's arrest, Archie, Veronica and Betty rush to show proof of a frame-up, while Jughead, convinced of his dad's guilt, prepares to leave town.
episodes.title: Chapter Twelve: Anatomy of a Murder

episodes.synopsis: As Riverdale prepares for its 75th jubilee, the gang struggles to return to normalcy, while FP faces pressure from the sheriff to turn informant.
episodes.title: Chapter Thirteen: The Sweet Hereafter

episodes.synopsis: The gang gathers to support a shaken Archie as Fred fights for his life, prompting Jughead and Betty to dig deeper into the gunman's motives.
episodes.title: Chapter Fourteen: A Kiss Before Dying

episodes.synopsis: With the future of Pop's in question, sleep deprivation has Archie on edge -- and increasingly paranoid that someone's out to harm those he loves.
episodes.title: Chapter Fifteen: Nighthawks

episodes.synopsis: Archie takes matters into his own hands when another violent crime rocks Riverdale. Jughead starts classes at Southside High.
episodes.title: Chapter Sixteen: The Watcher in the Woods

episodes.synopsis: Archie's viral video stirs up tensions all over town. Jughead and Betty put their heads together to solve a cipher from the Black Hood.
episodes.title: Chapter Seventeen: The Town That Dreaded Sundown

episodes.synopsis: Jughead takes a stand as the Serpents prepare to strike back, and the Black Hood hits Betty with a bombshell. Veronica hosts a friend from her past.
episodes.title: Chapter Eighteen: When a Stranger Calls

episodes.synopsis: Nick's poised to pay for his crimes until blame shifts to the Southside -- and Mayor McCoy strikes hard. Betty and Veronica go after “The Sugarman.”
episodes.title: Chapter Nineteen: Death Proof

episodes.synopsis: In a chilling letter, the Black Hood challenges the residents of Riverdale to remain sinless for 48 hours, putting everyone on edge -- and on alert.
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty: Tales from the Darkside

episodes.synopsis: The Black Hood investigation takes Archie and Veronica to "The Devil's House" and stirs new suspicions. Jughead and Betty join forces to honor FP.
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty-One: House of the Devil

episodes.synopsis: With Christmas in the air, a snooping Veronica uncovers a surprise in Hiram's study. Betty opens a horrifying gift, and Jughead strikes back at Penny.
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty-Two: Silent Night, Deadly Night

episodes.synopsis: Cultures clash when Southside students are forced to transfer to Riverdale High. The FBI approaches Archie, and Betty looks for her long-lost brother.
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty-Three: The Blackboard Jungle

episodes.synopsis: Archie tries to get closer to Hiram, Jughead digs up shocking details about Riverdale’s past, and Betty unearths dark secrets about her brother.
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty-Four: The Wrestler

episodes.synopsis: An act of vandalism stirs up suspicion. Meanwhile, Archie's new job as Hiram's intern has Veronica worried he'll learn the Lodge family secrets.
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty-Five: The Wicked and the Divine

episodes.synopsis: Betty's left feeling sick to her stomach after a night of unexpected violence. Agent Adams puts pressure on Archie while the Lodges prepare for war.
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty-Six: The Tell-Tale Heart

episodes.synopsis: A weekend away at the Lodge family lake house brings dark secrets -- and desires -- to the surface. Josie goes to Kevin with a painful truth.
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty-Seven: The Hills Have Eyes

episodes.synopsis: Fred weighs a surprising career change while Jughead works to unravel Hiram's master plan. Betty can't shake the suspicion that Chic is dangerous.
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty-Eight: There Will Be Blood

episodes.synopsis: Hermione ramps up her run for mayor with a celebrity endorsement, moving Jughead to political protest. Cheryl's slumber party takes a dark turn.
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty-Nine: Primary Colors

episodes.synopsis: Politics in Riverdale take a treacherous turn. The Coopers face unwelcome guests, while Toni, Veronica and Josie search for answers about Cheryl.
episodes.title: Chapter Thirty: The Noose Tightens

episodes.synopsis: As rehearsals ramp up for "Carrie: The Musical," the Riverdale drama students sink into their roles -- and life starts imitating art.
episodes.title: Chapter Thirty-One: A Night to Remember

episodes.synopsis: A violent tragedy sparks sinking suspicions that the Black Hood is still at large. Betty exposes a secret. Veronica confronts a voice from her past.
episodes.title: Chapter Thirty-Two: Prisoners

episodes.synopsis: The mayoral race heats up with a fiery debate as tension builds between the Bulldogs and the Serpents. Betty shares her suspicions with Cheryl.
episodes.title: Chapter Thirty-Three: Shadow of a Doubt

episodes.synopsis: A riot outside the sheriff's station erupts into all-out war. Veronica learns a devastating secret, and Betty sees the Black Hood face to face.
episodes.title: Chapter Thirty-Four: Judgment Night

episodes.synopsis: With the riot calmed and Betty’s dad in custody, the town awaits the results of two elections, and the gang rallies to unmask the other Black Hood.
episodes.title: Chapter Thirty-Five: Brave New World

episodes.synopsis: As summer draws to a close, Archie vows to make the most of his freedom, Polly confronts Betty’s dark secret and Jughead leads a pivotal attack.
episodes.title: Chapter Thirty-Six: "Labor Day"

episodes.synopsis: Betty and Jughead unpack a chilling new mystery as Veronica pursues an alternative road to justice. Elsewhere, Archie navigates a tense new normal.
episodes.title: Chapter Thirty-Seven: "Fortune and Men's Eyes"

episodes.synopsis: Veronica fights to save the speakeasy, Archie agrees to a dangerous deal, and Betty and Jughead dig deeper into Riverdale's secret communities.
episodes.title: Chapter Thirty-Eight: “As Above, So Below”

episodes.synopsis: Amidst a desperate search for answers, Alice revisits her disturbing ties to Gryphons and Gargoyles with Betty -- and a cast of familiar faces.
episodes.title: Chapter Thirty-Nine: "The Midnight Club"

episodes.synopsis: Jughead rolls the dice on a new psychological theory, Archie makes a renegade plan, and Veronica recruits the gang for a high-stakes mission.
episodes.title: Chapter Forty: "The Great Escape"

episodes.synopsis: As Betty orchestrates an underground meeting, Veronica uncovers a crucial piece of evidence. Elsewhere, Archie struggles with a devastating decision.
episodes.title: Chapter Forty-One: "Manhunter"

episodes.synopsis: Jughead and Archie explore an ominous small town. Veronica faces a financial crisis. Betty fights for her life -- and braces for a sinister reunion.
episodes.title: Chapter Forty-Two: "The Man in Black"

episodes.synopsis: After a shocking event rocks the Riverdale Vixens, Veronica stages a confrontation. Betty enlists an unlikely ally. Jughead reconnects with his past.
episodes.title: Chapter Forty-Three: "Outbreak"

episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of Hiram’s takeover, Veronica works to protect La Bonne Nuit. Betty hosts a group of desperate visitors. Archie faces his demons.
episodes.title: Chapter Forty-Four: "No Exit"

episodes.synopsis: While Archie stages a shocking return, the gang prepares for a new kind of test. Betty struggles with a covert visit. Jughead navigates a fatal error.
episodes.title: Chapter Forty-Five: "The Stranger"

episodes.synopsis: As Betty investigates a string of suicides, Jughead comes face-to-face with one of Hiram’s mysterious allies. Meanwhile, Archie spirals out of control.
episodes.title: Chapter Forty-Six: "The Red Dahlia"

episodes.synopsis: Veronica and Reggie resort to desperate measures, Moose grapples with an intimate decision, and the Riverdale adults heed a grim warning.
episodes.title: Chapter	Forty-Seven:	"Bizarrodale"

episodes.synopsis: As tensions mount between the Serpents and the Pretty Poisons, Betty chases the truth while Archie sets his sights on a dodgy deal -- and a new romance.
episodes.title: Chapter Forty-Eight: "Requiem for a Welterweight"

episodes.synopsis: Archie befriends a young runaway ... and revisits a piece of his past. Veronica leans into risk at La Bonne Nuit. Jughead works to unite the Serpents.
episodes.title: Chapter Forty-Nine: "Fire Walk With Me"

episodes.synopsis: The Joneses and Coopers navigate an unexpected move. Archie recruits the gang for a G&G mission. Reggie surprises Veronica with a risky request.
episodes.title: Chapter Fifty: "American Dreams"

episodes.synopsis: Singing, dancing and real-life drama collide as the crew prepares for Riverdale High's next musical. Elsewhere, Jughead deals with a painful revelation.
episodes.title: Chapter Fifty-One: "Big Fun"

episodes.synopsis: Betty enlists the help of Cheryl for a secret expedition, Jughead leads the Serpents on a personal mission and Archie reconnects with old friends.
episodes.title: Chapter Fifty-Two: “The Raid”

episodes.synopsis: As Betty dives deeper into Edgar’s mysterious power, Archie and Veronica team up for a high-stakes fight, and Jughead investigates a gruesome murder.
episodes.title: Chapter Fifty-Three: "Jawbreaker"

episodes.synopsis: The Joneses engage in a gripping journey, Archie faces criminal consequences, and Betty unpacks a string of shocking revelations about Evelyn.
episodes.title: Chapter Fifty-Four: “Fear the Reaper”

episodes.synopsis: As prom season sweeps through Riverdale, Betty works to uncover the truth about her father and Archie pushes his boxing career to its limits.
episodes.title: Chapter Fifty-Five: "Prom Night"

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of masquerade madness, Jughead searches for answers, Veronica stages an elaborate plan and Betty makes a chilling discovery.
episodes.title: Chapter Fifty-Six: "The Dark Secret of Harvest House"

episodes.synopsis: The past, present and future of Gryphons and Gargoyles come to a head as Archie, Betty, Jughead and Veronica prepare for one final round of gameplay.
episodes.title: Chapter Fifty-Seven: "Survive the Night"

episodes.synopsis: As Riverdale gets ready for a monumental celebration, Archie receives devastating news -- and leans on Veronica, Betty and Jughead for support.
episodes.title: Chapter Fifty-Eight: "In Memoriam"

episodes.synopsis: On the heels of tragedy, Archie forges a new beginning for an old friend. Jughead receives a special offer. Veronica pays for her parents’ mistakes.
episodes.title: Chapter Fifty-Nine: "Fast Times at Riverdale High"

episodes.synopsis: At Stonewall Prep, Jughead embraces a reunion ... and a rivalry. Elsewhere, Archie aims to serve the community and Betty prepares for critical action.
episodes.title: Chapter Sixty: "Dog Day Afternoon"

episodes.synopsis: A chilling mystery sweeps through Riverdale as the gang prepares for the mischief and mayhem of Halloween. Jughead gets caught in a sinister scheme.
episodes.title: Chapter Sixty-One: “Halloween”

episodes.synopsis: Betty explores her future -- and her complex past. Meanwhile, Stonewall Prep celebrates a literary franchise, and Veronica digs deep for justice.
episodes.title: Chapter Sixty-Two: "Witness for the Prosecution"

episodes.synopsis: Tension mounts as Archie tries to dethrone Dodger. Betty and Jughead examine their family histories, and Cheryl grows suspicious of her new houseguest.
episodes.title: Chapter Sixty-Three: “Hereditary”

episodes.synopsis: The weather turns frightful as Riverdale celebrates Thanksgiving ... with a not-so-cheery series of tense confrontations and twisted revelations.
episodes.title: Chapter Sixty-Four: “The Ice Storm”

episodes.synopsis: As the gang navigates college admission season, Archie makes a bold decision, Cheryl explores her grief and Veronica receives a complicated offer.
episodes.title: Chapter Sixty-Five: “In Treatment”

episodes.synopsis: After declaring war on Hiram, Veronica enlists a secret weapon. Elsewhere, Jughead’s search for his grandfather leads to more questions than answers.
episodes.title: Chapter Sixty-Six: "Tangerine"

episodes.synopsis: Emotions run high as Riverdale celebrates a monumental Spirit Week, Jughead considers a pivotal opportunity and Veronica pursues a new passion.
episodes.title: Chapter Sixty-Seven: "Varsity Blues"

episodes.synopsis: In the competitive heat of Quiz Show fever, Betty butts heads with Brett. Jughead encounters a new writerly challenge. Kevin considers a strange offer.
episodes.title: Chapter Sixty-Eight "Quiz Show"

episodes.synopsis: As Betty and Alice embark on a new investigation, Archie digs deeper into his uncle’s dark past. Meanwhile, Veronica reconnects with a familiar friend.
episodes.title: Chapter Sixty-Nine: "Men of Honor"

episodes.synopsis: Archie faces a hard truth and opens the doors of the El Royale to an unlikely patron. Jughead confronts a critical accusation ... for better or worse.
episodes.title: Chapter Seventy: "The Ides of March"

episodes.synopsis: While the gang grapples with a night of uncertainty, Betty attempts to better understand her own darkness. Archie’s mom shares some personal news.
episodes.title: Chapter Seventy-One: "How To Get Away With Murder"

episodes.synopsis: A heartbreaking call pushes Betty to her limits, Veronica and Archie get mixed up in Donna’s drama, and Alice embarks on a new passion project.
episodes.title: Chapter Seventy-Two: "To Die For"

episodes.synopsis: Betty continues her Stonewall Prep takedown — with the help of two unique allies. Meanwhile, a tense confrontation leads to a tender reunion.
episodes.title: Chapter Seventy-Three: "The Locked Room"

episodes.synopsis: As a menacing (and musical) new normal takes shape in Riverdale, Betty helps Jughead restore order and Kevin fights for his place in the spotlight.
episodes.title: Chapter Seventy-Four: "Wicked Little Town"

episodes.synopsis: Betty and Archie struggle with lingering feelings. Jughead and Charles track down Riverdale’s cinephiles. Veronica and Cheryl deal with bad blood.
episodes.title: Chapter Seventy-Five: "Lynchian"

episodes.synopsis: While the gang challenges Mr. Honey’s reign over Riverdale High, Jughead writes a new story — and explores the thin line between fact and fiction.
episodes.title: Chapter Seventy-Six: "Killing Mr. Honey"

episodes.synopsis: As prom night approaches, Betty and Jughead search for auteur answers and Veronica helps Archie prepare for a fight — with a familiar friend.
episodes.title: Chapter Seventy-Seven: "Climax"

episodes.synopsis: As Archie grapples with grief, Betty and Jughead uncover a chilling trend. Cheryl explores a new beginning. Veronica recruits help to take aim at Hiram.
episodes.title: Chapter Seventy-Eight: "The Preppy Murders"

episodes.synopsis: A pivotal chapter comes to a close as the gang prepares for graduation. Meanwhile, Archie explores his options and FP shares some surprising news.
episodes.title: Chapter Seventy-Nine: "Graduation"

episodes.synopsis: After years away, Archie returns to Riverdale and faces what has become of his humble hometown. Betty, Veronica, Jughead and others navigate adulthood.
episodes.title: Chapter Eighty: "Purgatorio"

episodes.synopsis: As the gang continues to reconcile the past and the present, Riverdale High faces an uncertain future. Meanwhile, tension mounts between Toni and Hiram.
episodes.title: Chapter Eighty-One: "The Homecoming"

episodes.synopsis: Jughead, Veronica, Betty and Archie return to their alma mater — and engage in new extracurriculars. The search for Polly takes an unnerving turn.
episodes.title: Chapter Eighty-Two: "Back to School"

episodes.synopsis: An alarming incident inspires Archie's next mission. Cheryl revisits her old stomping grounds. Jughead and Tabitha investigate a bizarre mystery.
episodes.title: Chapter Eighty-Three: "Fire in the Sky"

episodes.synopsis: Lingering feelings surface as Cheryl hosts a steamy party. Kevin and Fangs share major news. Jughead struggles to make sense of a mysterious encounter.
episodes.title: Chapter Eighty-Four: "Lock & Key"

episodes.synopsis: As Betty grapples with a grim revelation, Jughead grows concerned over a student. Veronica and Archie work to revamp the Riverdale football team.
episodes.title: Chapter Eighty-Five: "Destroyer"

episodes.synopsis: An explosive event triggers chaos across Riverdale. Archie receives a military order. Veronica visits Chad. Jughead pursues a unique high.
episodes.title: Chapter Eighty-Six: "The Pincushion Man"

episodes.synopsis: Chaos continues to threaten the fate of Riverdale. Betty searches for Jughead, with the help of new friends. Veronica scrambles to find a missing opal.
episodes.title: Chapter Eighty-Seven: "Strange Bedfellows"

episodes.synopsis: As tension boils over at home, Reggie turns to his dark and demanding partnership with Hiram. In response, Hiram reflects on his own rise to infamy.
episodes.title: Chapter Eighty-Eight: "Citizen Lodge"

episodes.synopsis: Betty faces major backlash — and crafts a lively new plan. Elsewhere, Archie grapples with his painful past, and Cheryl extends an invitation to Kevin.
episodes.title: Chapter Eighty-Nine: "Reservoir Dogs"

episodes.synopsis: Cheryl starts a new operation with the help of Archie and crew, but things take a terrifying turn. Meanwhile, Betty asks Alice to help combat evil.
episodes.title: Chapter Ninety: "The Night Gallery"

episodes.synopsis: Superstar Josie McCoy returns to Riverdale to record an album and reconnect with her past. Tabitha and Veronica explore a new business opportunity.
episodes.title: Chapter Ninety-One: "The Pussycats"

episodes.synopsis: As Archie painstakingly works to restore justice, Jughead makes a desperate creative decision. Meanwhile, Veronica challenges Chad's command.
episodes.title: Chapter Ninety-Two: "Band of Brothers"

episodes.synopsis: After receiving chilling news, Tabitha turns to Betty and Jughead for help. Chad hatches a plan with Hiram. A shocking attack shakes up Riverdale.
episodes.title: Chapter Ninety-Three: "Dance of Death"

episodes.synopsis: Betty struggles to make sense of Alice's lyrical new normal. Veronica and Archie take the next step. Tabitha introduces Jughead to her parents.
episodes.title: Chapter Ninety-Four: "Next to Normal"

episodes.synopsis: Tragedy strikes Pop's — and inspires major change. Meanwhile, Veronica delivers a warning, Betty celebrates a milestone and Jughead accepts an offer.
episodes.title: Chapter Ninety-Five: "Riverdale: RIP(?)"
